Articles.Content:
![ougIYL7.png](http://i.imgur.com/ougIYL7.png)

From the Untied Aces of Jebediah; engineering corps comes the MP-1 "Humming-Bird" Series. A set of 2 minimalist light jets, each carrying only a pilot. The Planes are exactly the same except for the engine (MP-1 = Basic Jet Engine) (MP-1T = Turbo Ramjet Engine)

![K3zaRns.png](http://i.imgur.com/K3zaRns.png)

MP-1 Specs:

Weight: 5.2 Tons

Parts: 19

Fuel: 150

Top Speed: 320 M/S

Price: $9,915

![EPIBDYY.png](http://i.imgur.com/EPIBDYY.png)

MP-1T Specs:

Weight: 5.5 Tons

Parts: 19

Fuel: 150

Top Speed: 445 M/S

Price: $11,215

![rDkTRQj.png](http://i.imgur.com/rDkTRQj.png)

MP-1 Download: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/37mti0zuzijs0da/MP-1%20HummingBird.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/37mti0zuzijs0da/MP-1%20HummingBird.craft?dl=0)

MP-1T Download: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/ff1v55u0wwsk9xc/MPT-1%20HummingBird.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ff1v55u0wwsk9xc/MPT-1%20HummingBird.craft?dl=0)

Note: Invert the Steering on the Rear Landing Gear for the Best Results

**OUR FORUM PAGE:**

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118553-United-Aces-of-Jebediah-Engineering-Corps-NOW-HIRING](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118553-United-Aces-of-Jebediah-Engineering-Corps-NOW-HIRING)

![LKA66L7.png](http://i.imgur.com/LKA66L7.png)
Only stock propellers could make this cuter!
Yeah, I know I'm waiting on squad to implement multiplayer and propellers.
That is just so clean... very nice. Very, very nice.

> 
> Only stock propellers could make this cuter!

Electric propellers would be sweet.

Also very nice design.

That's a nice looking Ultra Light Power Glider.(powered Hang Glider) Bet it is a nice little craft to fly about. The turbo ramjet engine is probably a bit overkill, nothing wrong with that though. How does it handle with the basic jet engine in place instead of the ramjet?

> 
> That's a nice looking Ultra Light Power Glider.(powered Hang Glider) Bet it is a nice little craft to fly about. The turbo ramjet engine is probably a bit overkill, nothing wrong with that though. How does it handle with the basic jet engine in place instead of the ramjet?

Not as fast and a lot longer distance to take off

> 
> This is very well done! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thank you very much
